item.title: Roundup of growth chart packages
item.description: At rOpenSciâ€™s annual unconf, I suggested a project to work on functions that convert physical growth measurements into z-scores and percentiles. For example, researchers in the United States studying childhood obesity often calculate the BMI z-score or percentage of the 95th percentile of BMI from nationally representative survey data. During the process of brainstorming and working on this project, the team1 I was working with found out some related R packages that do this.
